response.name: K8s Cluster with Username and Password
response.description: K8s Cluster with Username and Password
response.yaml:
connector:
    name: Sample K8s Connector
    identifier: Sample_K8s_Connector
    orgIdentifier: Devops
    type: K8sCluster
    spec:
        credential:
            type: ManualConfig
            spec:
                auth:
                    type: UserPassword
                    spec:
                        username: someUsername
                        passwordRef: somePassWordRef

response.name: K8s Cluster with Client Key Cert
response.description: K8s Cluster with Client Key Cert
response.yaml:
connector:
    name: Sample K8s Connector
    identifier: Sample_K8s_Connector
    orgIdentifier: Devops
    type: K8sCluster
    spec:
        credential:
            type: ManualConfig
            spec:
                auth:
                    type: ClientKeyCert
                    spec:
                        caCertRef: someCaCertRef
                        clientCertRef: someClientCertRef
                        clientKeyAlgo: someClientKeyAlgo
                        clientKeyPassphraseRef: someClientKeyPassphraseRef
                        clientKeyRef: someClientKeyRef

response.name: K8s Cluster with Service Account
response.yaml:
connector:
    name: Sample K8s Connector
    identifier: Sample_K8s_Connector
    orgIdentifier: Devops
    type: K8sCluster
    spec:
        credential:
            type: ManualConfig
            spec:
                auth:
                    type: ClientKeyCert
                    spec:
                        caCertRef: someCaCertRef
                        clientCertRef: someClientCertRef
                        clientKeyAlgo: someClientKeyAlgo
                        clientKeyPassphraseRef: someClientKeyPassphraseRef
                        clientKeyRef: someClientKeyRef

response.name: K8s Cluster with Open Id Connect
response.description: A Deployment Stage with CodeDeploy Setup
response.yaml:
connector:
    name: Sample K8s Connector
    identifier: Sample_K8s_Connector
    orgIdentifier: Devops
    type: K8sCluster
    spec:
        credential:
            type: ManualConfig
            spec:
                auth:
                    type: OpenIdConnect
                    spec:
                        oidcClientIdRef: someOidcClientIdRef
                        oidcIssuerUrl: someOidcIssuerUrl
                        oidcPasswordRef: someOidcPasswordRef
                        oidcScopes: someOidcScopes
                        oidcSecretRef: someOidcSecretRef
                        oidcUsername: someOidcUsername

response.name: K8s Cluster with In-Cluster Delegate
response.yaml:
connector:
    name: Sample K8s Connector
    identifier: Sample_K8s_Connector
    orgIdentifier: Devops
    type: K8sCluster
    spec:
        credential:
            type: InheritFromDelegate
            spec:
                delegateName: someDelegateName
